title: Back to Bed v1.1.3
description:
Back to Bed is a 3D puzzle game set in a unique and artistic dream world, wherein you guide the sleepwalker Bob to the safety of his bed.

To achieve this, you must take control of Bobâ€™s subconscious guardian named Subob. The pair travels through a surreal and painting-like dream world, filled with objects used to guide Bob towards the Bed, but also dangers that must be avoided! 

No ads and no in-app purchases.

Features: 

â€¢ Unique surreal and artistic game universe: A strange but beautiful dream universe that mixes elements from the real world and the world of dreams to create something unique, surreal and sometimes a bit scary. 

â€¢ Isometric puzzle levels: Navigate detailed 3D puzzles that defy the laws of physics, wherein the player must manipulate the strange environment to create a safe path Bob and avoid the dangers of the puzzle. 

â€¢ Two characters as one: Play as the embodied subconsciousness, in the form of a small guardian creature, trying to save its own sleepwalking body from dangers of the dream world. 

â€¢ Picturesque visual style: Discover the feeling of playing in a piece of art set in a digital frame. A visual style inspired by hand-painted techniques, surreal art and impossible shapes. 

â€¢ Nightmare mode: Unlock a more challenging version of the game, made for those who truly want to test their puzzle solving skills and enjoy thinking many steps ahead, or who are just too stubborn to give up. 

â€¢ MOGA-support: Enjoy Back to Bed with MOGA controllers.

What's New:

Moga controllers now work correctly on Android 5 devices

More Info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bedtime.backtobed


Instructions:

1.Copy 'com.bedtime.backtobed' folder to 'sdcard/Android/obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
